top_comments.comment: It's a sure thing with Lisa, she's definitely the hostess with the mostess. A designer who makes our world finer. A self given saint who teaches us how to pick the right paint. The lady with her own grove, with a great channel on YouTube !  Love ya 💕
I would add some coasters, a box of tissues, bottled water and a small trash can.  Great video!
I look at my guest rooms as if I am going to stay there: is it comfortable, is the light within easy reach when reading in bed, etc etc. Thank you for the tips, I am missing the comfy throw! 😍
Love this video! Thank you! I also have 2 nice luggage racks I can put out for guests. People always tell me how much they love having a luggage rack!
